short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that will show you video reviews of the product you are seeing on Amazon, Flipkart etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blue Owl is an chrome extension that help buyers of Amazon, Flipkart to make buying decision wisely by watching the video reviews of the given product on YouTube. Along with buyers, it can help YouTube content creators to get more views by making videos on popular products on marketplaces.
